creator: andrew.chapman@clicktools.com
text:
To facilitate precompiling JSPs in ANT without tag pooling 
an "setIsPoolingEnabled()" method (and member variable) is needed in 
org.apache.jasper.JspC. This would then be the value returned by 
the "isPoolingEnabled()" method instead of the current hard-coded "true".

We have also seen this as an issue that still remains in 4.1.27, which affects
third-party taglibs that are written in a way that is incompatible with tag pooling.

Is there any move to include this fix in a future release?
creator: kosh.podder@ubs.com

text: This was never fixed in 4.1.x but was fixed in 5.5.x onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
